entry.name: clip
entry.desc: The clip effect will hide or show an element by clipping the element vertically or horizontally

dl.dd: Will use hide or show depending on the current visibility of the element

desc.p: The plane in which the clip effect will hide or show its element

option.name: duration
option.desc: The number of ms the animation will run for

option.name: complete
option.desc: A callback function, executed when the effect completes
